title: My Boards Icon isn't updating...
body:
I've noticed this for awhile but for some reason it's stuck on the winged sword and it ain't changing...

Rito plz?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Sometimes the boards are a bit funky, could you try the following for me.

* Logout of the website and your client.
* Log back into your client and set your summoner icon.
* Log back into the boards.
* Make a post.

I'll also pass this on to see if anyone can help out.
